description:
Despite advertising carbon capture, ExxonMobil saw marginal role for It in fighting climate change. Internal documents unearthed by a U.S. Senate panel show the oil giant modeled up to 500 CCS sites operating globally by 2050, far fewer than rival Shell.

The post Despite Advertising Carbon Capture, ExxonMobil Saw Marginal Role for It in Fighting Climate Change  appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Despite Advertising Carbon Capture, ExxonMobil Saw Marginal Role for It in Fighting Climate Change
